acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in a transfer of court papers from Chesterfield County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Chesterfield County was formed in 1749 from Henrico County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Deed books, 1749-1755, of Chesterfield County Court. The deed books record the name of the grantor and grantee, the residence of both individuals and the description of property being sold or transferred. The volumes have indexes which contains the first and last names of both parties. It is arranged alphabetically from A-Z.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Chesterfield County Deed Books can be found on microfilm at The Library of Virginia. See A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm
